name: Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash With Rice Water & Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 150 ml (Pack of 2)
summary: Achieve radiant, glass-like skin with the Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash, enriched with rice water and niacinamide. This gentle cleanser hydrates and purifies, leaving your skin refreshed and glowing.

summary: Achieve a salon-like glow with the Rice Facial Kit, featuring rice water and niacinamide to enhance skin texture and deliver glass-like skin in just six steps.

name: Multani Mitti Face Wash with Multani Mitti & Bulgarian Rose For Oil Control & Acne - 100 ml
summary: This Multani Mitti Face Wash combines the oil-controlling benefits of Multani Mitti with the soothing properties of Bulgarian Rose to combat acne and promote hydration, leaving your skin refreshed and balanced.
